toydb

An SQL engine written in Rust
git clone https://github.com/erikgrinaker/toydb
Log | Files | Refs | README | LICENSE

ci.yml (627B)

      1 name: CI
      2 on: [push, pull_request, workflow_dispatch]
      3 permissions:
      4   contents: read
      5 
      6 jobs:
      7   test:
      8     name: Test
      9     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
     10     timeout-minutes: 10
     11 
     12     steps:
     13     - uses: actions/checkout@v3
     14     - uses: dtolnay/rust-toolchain@1.77.0
     15       id: toolchain
     16       with:
     17         components: clippy, rustfmt
     18     - uses: actions/cache@v3
     19       with:
     20         path: target
     21         key: ${{runner.os}}-target-${{steps.toolchain.outputs.cachekey}}-${{hashFiles('Cargo.lock')}}
     22     - run: cargo build --bins --tests
     23     - run: cargo test
     24     - run: cargo clippy --tests --no-deps -- -D warnings
     25     - run: cargo fmt --check
